Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

“The laser seared off my right arm. I saw it there on the ground beside me. Unavoidable, imminent death gripped me. The angry mob rushed forward to finish me. Then I blinked. I felt a slight tug. My mind buzzed. Somehow, I was behind a defensive bulwark beside a Voidtech Phase Manipulator. It was as if time rewound. My arm was back where it belonged. Crackling blue energy burst from the device dispersing angry protestors. Rifle in my restored arm, I returned fire with renewed vigor; saved by this Voidtech invention.”—Peaceworker Jaya N’Kilpanni, “RV-4417M: Famine’s Era”

“射线烧毁了我的右臂，它就在我的身边，我避无可避，死亡已经将我包围。愤怒的人群冲了过来，想要置我于死地。我眨了眨眼，感觉到了一阵轻微的拉拽。我的大脑嗡嗡作响，我的身体以某种方式移动到了一处防御工事后方，旁边放着一台相位操纵器。时间仿佛被回溯了一样，我的胳膊再一次完好如初。蓝色的能量从设备中发出，涌向了愤怒的抗议群众。我的步枪也随着胳膊回到了自己的手中，我得以再次向他们发起攻击，这一切都归功于这台虚空科技发明。”- 维和工作者加亚·恩基帕尼，“RV-4417M：饥荒年代”

“Anyone can learn to fold alternate dimensional probabilities using the Echo Walker, if they have the right Voidtech. We suggest program directors prescreen soldiers using this technology for single-mindedness. There should be no personal conflicts hidden within their psyche. Indecisiveness is a killer when entangling probabilistic quantum-realities. Some original prototypes created hostile dimensional echoes. Their doppelgangers actually attacked the tech-users. No one wants to summon their evil twin from an alternate dimension, even if it has better facial hair. The two must share the same willingness to destroy the same enemy.” —Trainer Richter Gray, “RV-3414M: Void Echo Augmentation Tech”

“只要拥有回声行者这种虚空科技，任何人都能学会折叠其他位面的可能性。我们建议项目主管使用这种技术对士兵进行洗脑，这样他们的精神中就不会隐藏有杂念了。在进入概率性量子现实时，犹豫就会送命。一些原型机能够生成含有敌意的位面回声，他们的二重身甚至会攻击使用者。没人想从其他位面召唤来一个邪恶的自己，即便他的胡须更帅。二者在必须拥有相同的敌人。”- 训练师里克特·格雷，“RV-3414M：虚空回声增幅技术”

“I tried to warn them. General Mustlebox’s last words were, “It’s just a rift, fly over it!” That’s when the large donut-shaped ship projected a pulsating dimensional rift into the center of the company. Gravity shifted sideways. Time skipped. Vehicles, men, aircraft phase-shifted in all directions. The General’s vehicle rematerialized in a stone wall. Being unable to breathe solid rock, he died. My turret was rendered out of phase with reality. Our shots had no effect, phasing through its targets. The upside was we were intangible as the VoidTech weapon decimated the colony’s defenses.”—Mah Reg’Nib, “RV-3498X: Dimensional Explorations”

“我已经厌烦于警告他们了，姆斯特博克斯将军的遗言就是，‘只不过是个裂隙，飞过去！’那时一个甜甜圈型的飞船向着公司的中心发射了一道位面裂隙。重力将道路牵引得七扭八歪，连时间都被吸了进去。载具、人、飞行器，被相位转移到各处，将军的载具被转移到了一面石墙中。他在坚固的岩石中无法呼吸，所以死去了。我的炮台被撕扯得粉碎。我们的射击没有任何效果，只是从它身上穿了过去。在这样强大的虚空武器面前，殖民地的防御设施根本形同虚设。”- 玛·瑞格尼布，“RV-3498X：位面探索”
